mapper.select: SELECT sellerReport_num,name, productcode, ir.memberidx, reason, TO_CHAR(report_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') report_date, ir.category_num, category_name , TO_CHAR(processdate,'YYYY-MM-DD')processdate , TO_CHAR(releasedate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')releasedate FROM item_report ir LEFT OUTER JOIN member_info m ON m.memberidx = ir.memberidx LEFT OUTER JOIN report_category rc ON rc.category_num = ir.category_num WHERE sellerReport_num = #{num}

SELECT report_code, memberidx, review_num, category_num, content, report_date, TO_CHAR(processdate,'YYYY-MM-DD')processdate FROM productreviewreport prr LEFT OUTER JOIN member_info m ON m.memberidx = prr.memberidx LEFT OUTER JOIN report_category rc ON rc.category_num = prr.category_num WHERE report_code = #{num}
